title: Review and Approve a Vendor Invoice
description: A managing partner needs to review and approve an invoice from an expert witness before it can be paid.

tasks.description: Review the expert witness invoice for compliance with the terms of their engagement letter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the hourly rates and expenses are correct.

tasks.description: Approve the invoice for payment in the firm's accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent marks the invoice as approved.

tasks.description: Forward the approved invoice to the accounts payable department to process the payment.
